nl.renarj.jasdb.index.keys.keyinfo

Interface KeyInfo

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KeyInfoImpl

    public interface KeyInfo
    This represents all the key information in an index
    Author:
    Renze de Vries

    • Method Summary

      List<IndexField> getIndexKeyFields()

      KeyInfoType getInfoType() 
      KeyFactory getKeyFactory()
      The key factory used to create/serialize/deserialize keys for the index

      Returns all the fields kept in the key part of the index
      String getKeyName()
      Returns a name of the key field(s)
      KeyNameMapper getKeyNameMapper()
      Gets the key name mapper which can be used to map the name of the field to a position in the key payload.
      int getKeySize()
      This determines the byte size that is required to store all the key information in the index

      • valueAsHeader

        String valueAsHeader()
        Persists all value information as a header string
        Returns:
        The value information as header string

      • match

        int match(Set<String> fields)
        Determines how close the gives fields match the index descriptor. The scale is on 0-200. This would reach 200 in case all value fields and index fields are a 100% match. The calculation is N (number of matching fields) / field.size + (N / fields.size) * included matching columns.
        Parameters:
        fields - The fields to check for matching
        Returns:
        The matching on a scale from 0-200

      • getKeySize

        int getKeySize()
        This determines the byte size that is required to store all the key information in the index
        Returns:
        The bytesize required to store all the key information
